snippet: The belief of Lucy Richards that the school massacre in Newton, Conn., was a hoax motivated her to send threatening messages to the parent of one of the slain children, officials say....
lead_paragraph: The belief of Lucy Richards that the school massacre in Newton, Conn., was a hoax motivated her to send threatening messages to the parent of one of the slain children, officials say.

headline.main: Florida Woman Is Charged With Threatening Sandy Hook Parent
headline.print_headline: Fake News Was Impetus for Threats, Officials Say
